There's now a proven a way for men of all ages, body types, and fitness levels to reduce chest and belly fat

settings.s4_heading: Join Thousands of Men Finally Losing Weight & Reclaim Their Vitality with Thaura
settings.s4_description:
Most supplements only address one aspect of weight management. Dryft™ works differently.
Just 2 capsules a day targets all three physiological changes simultaneously: 

1️⃣ Appetite Regulation: Helps control hunger signals and reduce cravings 

2️⃣ Metabolic Support: Helps optimize your body's natural fat-burning processes

3️⃣ Energy Balance: Helps maintain stable energy levels throughout the day

This comprehensive approach is why men see results with Dryft™ when other solutions fail.
settings.s4_description_2: Stop feeling older than you are and start living with renewed vitality and confidence.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha Extract (KSM66)
settings.description: The most extensively researched adaptogen available. Scientifically shown to help support healthy stress response. Studies suggest men experience improvements in body composition in as little as 8 weeks. When your body is properly supported, your efforts can finally show results.

settings.heading: Lactobacillus Gasseri (10 Billion CFU)
settings.description: In clinical 12-week studies, L. Gasseri helped reduce visceral fat, decrease waist circumference, and support metabolic function. It's a key ingredient for men struggling with a soft midsection, chest, and stubborn fat storage.

settings.heading: DIM + Boron
settings.description: This balancing duo helps support healthy metabolic function and hormonal balance. Together they may help maintain normal hormone levels and support improved body composition.

settings.heading: GlucoVantage® (Dihydroberberine)
settings.description: 5x more powerful than regular berberine. Helps support healthy blood sugar, promotes metabolic health, and assists with weight management naturally. Helps support carbohydrate metabolism. A powerful ally for metabolic balance.

settings.heading: Grains of Paradise
settings.description: Studies suggest it can help support metabolic rate by stimulating brown adipose tissue (the body's heat‑producing "brown fat"), which may help with weight management in as little as 4 weeks.

settings.heading: Cayenne Pepper Extract (40,000 SHU)
settings.description: Natural capsaicin helps support metabolic function, helps manage appetite, and enhances nutrient absorption - supporting your body's natural processes. Studies suggest it may help increase metabolic activity even at rest.

settings.heading: L-Theanine
settings.description: Promotes alpha brain wave activity, helps manage stress response, and supports sleep quality without drowsiness. When paired with Ashwagandha, it helps promote focus during the day and restful sleep at night — so your body can recover properly.

settings.heading: Zinc Glycinate
settings.description: Our glycinate form absorbs better than regular zinc, scientifically shown to help you maintain healthy hormone levels, support metabolic function, and aid recovery.

settings.heading: We're On a Mission To Help 1M Men Feel Confident Again
settings.description: Meet The Experts Behind Dryft™

settings.heading: How is this different from other products that haven't worked for me?
settings.description: Most supplements only target one aspect with insufficient amounts of active ingredients. We use 9 scientifically-supported ingredients at effective doses to help address multiple factors affecting weight management - metabolic function, appetite regulation, and energy balance. That's why our customers see meaningful results within weeks.

settings.heading: Will this interfere with my body's natural processes?
settings.description: These are natural compounds that help support your body's own metabolic function. No synthetic hormones, no invasive procedures, no needles, no lifetime commitment. You can discontinue use at any time without negative effects.

settings.heading: What if my health markers are "normal"?
settings.description: That's exactly who this is for. Most of our customers have "normal" health markers but still feel frustrated because metabolic factors are affecting their results. We help support the whole system, not just isolated aspects.

settings.heading: How quickly will I notice results?
settings.description: Many men report improved sleep and energy within the first week. By weeks 2-3, you may notice your clothes fitting more comfortably as the formula begins working. The most significant changes typically appear between weeks 8-12. This is why you have a 90-day guarantee. Remember, this isn't a quick fix - it's a science-backed formula that works with your body's natural processes, which takes time. That's why thousands of men continue using it - the gradual, sustainable results are worth it.

settings.heading: What if it doesn't work for me?
settings.description: We offer a 90-day money-back guarantee. Try it for 3 full months. If you don't see improvements in body composition and feel more energetic, we'll refund your purchase. No returns required. Zero risk.

settings.heading: Is it safe with medications?
settings.description: The natural ingredients are generally compatible with most medications. However, we always recommend consulting your healthcare provider if you're taking prescription medications, particularly for blood pressure or blood sugar management, as some ingredients may complement their effects.

settings.heading: How much time will this add to my already busy schedule?
settings.description: Just 30 seconds each morning to take your 2 capsules—that's it. No special meal preparation, no extensive workout routines, no complicated protocols to follow. We designed Dryft™ specifically for busy professional men who need results without time-consuming regimens. The 30-second morning routine integrates seamlessly into your life, working effectively while you focus on what matters.
